trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.FaultDescription" /> objects that you can use to obtain information about SOAP faults in a contract.
trans-unit.target: 계약에서 SOAP 오류에 대한 정보를 가져오는 데 사용할 수 있는 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.FaultDescription" /> 개체 컬렉션을 나타냅니다.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.FaultDescriptionCollection.Find%2A> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.FaultDescriptionCollection.FindAll%2A> methods to retrieve a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.FaultDescription> or group of <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.FaultDescription> objects.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.FaultDescriptionCollection.Find%2A> 또는 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.FaultDescriptionCollection.FindAll%2A> 개체 그룹을 검색하려면 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.FaultDescription> 및 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.FaultDescription> 메서드를 사용합니다.

trans-unit.source: Returns the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.FaultDescription" /> object that has the specified action value.
trans-unit.target: 지정한 동작 값을 가진 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.FaultDescription" /> 개체를 반환합니다.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.FaultDescription" /> object that has the specified action, or <see langword="null" />.
If more than one <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.FaultDescription" /> object has the same action, the first one in the collection is returned.
trans-unit.target: 동일한 동작을 가진 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.FaultDescription" /> 개체가 여러 개일 경우 컬렉션의 첫 번째 개체가 반환됩니다.

trans-unit.source: Returns all <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.FaultDescription" /> objects that have the specified action value.
trans-unit.target: 지정한 동작 값을 가진 모든 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.FaultDescription" /> 개체를 반환합니다.

trans-unit.source: A collection of <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.FaultDescription" /> objects that have the specified action.
If there are no <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.FaultDescription" /> objects with the action, an empty collection is returned.
trans-unit.target: 해당 동작을 가진 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Description.FaultDescription" /> 개체가 없는 경우에는 빈 컬렉션이 반환됩니다.
